name: Quantum X1
description: Experience ultimate gaming performance with the TechSphere Quantum X1. Designed for intense gaming sessions, supporting 4K resolution, ray tracing, and VR technologies to immerse you in the action.

name: Razor 2050
description: Meet the UltraTech Razor 2050, a budget-friendly GPU that doesn't compromise on performance. Tailored for smooth 1080p gaming, delivering efficiency and reliability in every frame.

name: Velocity V2
description: SpectraTech's Velocity V2 is your gateway to enhanced multi-monitor setups and smooth streaming. Ideal for content creators looking for versatility and performance.

name: Phantom G4
description: Unlock unparalleled performance with the NextGenTech Phantom G4, equipped with features to excel in AI and machine learning tasks, offering robust processing capabilities.

name: ThunderBolt 16GB DDR5
description: Unleash your system's true potential with RamifyTech's ThunderBolt 16GB DDR5. High-speed, low latency, and designed to overclock, it ensures a seamless performance.

name: SwiftCore 16GB DDR4
description: Enhance your multitasking capabilities with MemTech’s SwiftCore 16GB DDR4. Reliable, durable, and optimized for consistent performance in various computing environments.

name: ViperStrike 32GB DDR4
description: Elevate your gaming and content creation with ViperTech’s ViperStrike 32GB DDR4. High-capacity RAM designed to handle demanding applications with ease.

name: Legacy 16GB DDR3
description: ClassicTech’s Legacy 16GB DDR3 offers great value, ensuring compatibility and reliable performance for legacy and entry-level systems.

name: PowerHouse i9
description: ChipMasters PowerHouse i9 delivers multi-core excellence, hyper-threading, and robust performance, making it suitable for gaming rigs and workstations.

name: StreamPro i7
description: The StreamPro i7 from SiliconGurus is engineered for streamers and content creators, ensuring efficient performance, smooth multitasking, and reliable streaming.

name: Ryzer 7
description: InnovaTech's Ryzer 7 is a gamer’s delight, featuring enhanced VR capabilities, a thoughtful thermal design, and impressive clock speeds.

name: Xenon X12
description: Explore high-performance computing with ProcessorPro’s Xenon X12, ideal for AI tasks, professional content creation, and heavy multitasking.

name: Tactile Pro Keyboard
description: Experience superior typing with Periphera's Tactile Pro Keyboard. Equipped with RGB lighting, it offers an ergonomic design and durable build quality.

name: GlideMaster Mouse
description: Enhance your navigation with Periphera's GlideMaster Mouse, featuring adjustable DPI settings, vivid RGB lighting, and a design that maximizes comfort and precision.

name: Illumina Keyboard
description: Discover a sleek design and convenient multimedia keys with the Illumina Keyboard by Periphera. Its backlit keys ensure a delightful typing experience.

name: PrecisePoint Mouse
description: Experience the freedom of wireless navigation with the PrecisePoint Mouse by Periphera. Its portable design and battery efficiency make it an ideal choice for users on the go.
